oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunway Vitamins' Program 2 featuring: Buddy Starcher
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First recording is Buddy Starcher radio transcription sponsored by Sunway Vitamins, circa late 1940s. Labeled as program number IV M (possibly for 'master', unconfirmed). . Second recording is a Buddy Starcher radio transcription sponsored by Sunway Vitamins, circa late 1940s. Not labeled with a program number but content is identical to another disc labeled as program number I (see TR001383_1).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Starcher
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Guitar introduction theme (Buddy Starcher) -- (00:48) Do You Want My Heart (Buddy Starcher) -- (02:50) Starcher performs a commercial break for Sunway Vitamins -- (06:20) I Dreamed I Searched Heaven for You (Buddy Starcher) -- (08:51) Starcher performs a commercial break for Sunway Vitamins -- (11:21) Carless Darling (Buddy Starcher) -- (14:05) Guitar outro theme (Buddy Starcher) -- (15:00) Guitar introduction theme (Buddy Starcher) -- (15:46) Candy Kisses (Buddy Starcher) -- (17:45) Starcher performs a commercial break for Sunway Vitamins -- (20:48) My Mother's Bible (Buddy Starcher) -- (22:44) Starcher performs a commercial break for Sunway Vitamins -- (25:18) New Wildwood Flower (Buddy Starcher) -- (27:31) Starcher performs a commercial break for Sunway Vitamins -- (29:02) Guitar outro theme(Buddy Starcher)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Starcher, Buddy, 1906-2001;
